# Drama League Award for Outstanding Direction of a Play

}}
The Drama League Award for Outstanding Direction of a Play is a theater award presented annually since 2022 by The Drama League for the most outstanding director of a play of the theater season.
Jamie Lloyd has received the most nominations in the category, with three. No director has won the award twice since its addition in 2022.
